mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class(class_name, class_year, dept_id) VALUE (#{className}, (SELECT id as class_year FROM grade WHERE grade_name = #{gardeName}), #{deptid})
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET counsellor_id = #{id} WHERE id = #{classid}
UPDATE class SET counsellor_id = NULL WHERE id = #{classid}
UPDATE class SET dept_id = NULL WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, class_name, class_year, create_time, modify_time FROM class where class_year = #{gardeID} LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(id) from class where class_year = (SELECT id FROM grade WHERE grade_name = #{name})
SELECT id, class_name, class_year, create_time, modify_time FROM class where class_year = #{gardeID}
SELECT id, class_name, class_year, create_time, modify_time FROM class where class_year = #{id} AND dept_id = #{deptid}
